nodes.text: Worra was a womp rat who lived during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. Prior to the Battle of Yavin, the Human male Boelo, a henchman of the crime lord Jabba the Hutt, owned Worra as a pet.
Worra was first mentioned in the lore for the Boelo character's card in the 1998 Special Edition Limited expansion set of Decipher, Inc.'s Star Wars Customizable Card Game.
